[[inst_ld_umin]]
==== LD.UMIN

*Syntax:* ld.umin<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Unsigned Min operation: memory value is atomically unsigned mined with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_umin.svg[LD.UMIN encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
